text: The Jadav Koli (also spelled as Jadhav Koli) is a clan (Gotra, Kutumb) of Koli caste mostly lives in the Indian states of Gujarat, Maharashtra, Goa, Karnataka and the Union Territories of Dadra and Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu and the nearby areas. Some of the Jadav Kolis of Gujarat often use the Darbar and Thakor as their hereditary titles and some of the Jadav Kolis use Patel title. == References == Category:Koli clans
title: Jadav Koli
